Package com.example.team04adventure.View

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllStoriesListSwipe
    This class implements the first half of the "home screen".
    CreateFragment
    CreateFragment creates the activity that is called when the user chooses to create a new fragment.
    EditFragment
    EditFragment creates the activity screen displayed when the user chooses to edit an existing fragment of the story.
    fragList
    fragList creates the list of fragments that exist in a story.
    FragmentViewer
    FragmentViewer creates the activity that lets the user view the contents of the fragment.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is the initial login screen that the user sees upon opening the app.
    MyStoriesListSwipe
    MyStoriesListSwipe is the fragment in the swipe view that contains the cached stories.
    OnlineStoryIntro
    OnlineStoryIntro creates the activity that the user enters when the user selects a story from the online story list.
    StoryIntro
    StoryIntro creates the activity that the user sees when the user selects a story from the cached story list.
